metadata.title: CVE-2019-15737 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition through12.2.1. Certain account actions needed improved authentication and sessionmanagement.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
